text: Helen Blane (5 September 1913 - 12 April 2000) was a British alpine skier. She competed in the women's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:2000 deaths Category:British female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Great Britain Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from London
title: Helen Blane
